description: Main entry point of a Flutter mobile app, defining the application widget and home page with basic UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, displaying a loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the MaterialApp and Scaffold.
